t: F.B. Washburn Candy Corporation - Pristine Surfaces
s: April 27, 2021 - The F.B. Washburn Candy Corporation, located in Brockton, MA and founded in 1856, is America’s oldest family-owned candy business. The company produces Sevigny’s Thin Ribbon Candy, Old Fashioned Hard and Filled candies, and Yummy-Pops delivering to retailers throughout the United States and Canada.
